summary: Door Quotation app - managing door dimensions, coating quotes, and PDF generation
architectural_notes: PDF output displays only actual entered dimensions (with fractions); rounded values used internally for calculations only
Dimension display consistency across web view, PDF, print, and WhatsApp share
Rounding logic preserved for sq.ft calculation but hidden from all user-facing outputs

existing_features.title: Update pdfGenerator.ts to display only actual entered door dimensions (with fractions like 1/8, 5/8) in the PDF table. Remove any display of rounded height or rounded width values.

Remove or replace the note 'All calculations are based on rounded dimensions...' in the PDF. Either remove it completely, or replace with 'Calculations are done as per standard carpenter rules. Entered sizes are shown for reference.'
Update QuotationActions.tsx to ensure WhatsApp share displays only actual entered dimensions (not rounded dimensions) in the shared message.
Verify print view consistency to ensure printed output shows only actual entered dimensions (not rounded dimensions).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update DoorEntryList.tsx to display only actual entered dimensions in the web view table. Remove any display of rounded dimensions while keeping them for internal calculation.
